title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: At aconventicle held on one of the Lomond hills iu Fife,it was reported and believed that an angelic formappeared in the air, hovering above the assembledcongregation, with his foot advanced, as if in theact of keeping waich for their safety.
